quote: Mave believed that not being able to see your life clearly, to scrutinize it intelligently, meant that probably you were at the dead center of it, and that couldn't possibly be a bad thing.
quote_letters: MAVE BELIEVED THAT NOT BEING ABLE TO SEE YOUR LIFE CLEARLY TO SCRUTINIZE IT INTELLIGENTLY MEANT THAT PROBABLY YOU WERE AT THE DEAD CENTER OF IT AND THAT COULDNT POSSIBLY BE A BAD THING
